com.qtplaf.library.swing.core

Class JMaskedField

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • com.qtplaf.library.swing.core.JMaskedField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EditField, EditLabel, java.awt.event.FocusListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class JMaskedField
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements EditField, java.awt.event.FocusListener
    A JFormattedTextField that is comfortable working Field's and Value's. To avoid using directly JFormattedTextField, although if provides access to the formatted text field, it extends a JPanel that contains the formatted text field, thus showing a more clear interface.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
